post.title: States Performance Times & Volunteer Request
post.description:
Hi Band Families,
Mr. Vitale has updated his website with important information. Please see his D
post.content:
Hi Band Families,

Mr. Vitale has updated his website with important information. Please see his Director’s Notes page.

He has posted information on States on the Performances page of his website. Here is a quick list of performance times on April 22 (Friday) and April 23 (Saturday).

  • Freshman Band - 8:00 AM - Saturday - Gym Stage
  • Concert Band - 4:00 PM - Friday - Gym Stage
  • Symphonic Band - 9:20 PM - Friday - Gym Stage
  • Wind Ensemble - 7:50 PM - Friday - Auditorium Stage

We still need volunteers for States on April 22 & 23 and for Easter Seals on April 23. We are hoping that more of you can sign up now that the schedules have been posted. If you can help out please click the links below to sign up.

States Sign Up

Easter Seals Sign Up

Thanks!

Becky Humes Communications Coordinator
